activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10684
activity.text: @rithviknishad Now if we want pagination in this page as there is a separate component Appointment row, we need useFilters in that also right. In other places in care everything is included in one page so by declaring useFilters once only we are able to access qParams, updateQuery, resultsPerPage and Pagination. So what is the alternative?? should I declare useFilters once in the  Appointments page component and again in the Appointments row component?? because we want the Pagination omponent in the AppointmentRow commponent.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#10741
activity.text: @Jacobjeevan @rithviknishad The cause for this bug was that after updating a valueset the cache was not cleared. To address this root cause I added removeQueries so that on update mutation the cache gets cleared. Its only after updating that the valueset gets refetched.
